# How to Control Content in PWA - Secure Uploads, Secure Downloads

Last updated December 14, 2023 by Appdome

Appdome Secure PWA allows developers to control content to prevent data leakage, theft, or misuse, protecting data using Appdome **secure upload** and **secure download** facilities. With Secure PWA developers can ensure content is securely uploaded and downloaded, and that controls are put in place every time data is moved.

## **What is Appdome Secure PWA**?

Appdome Secure PWA is a no-code mobile development framework that enables anyone to convert any website into a mobile application in minutes – no code or coding required. Using Appdome, anyone can build a progressive web app (PWA) that runs on any iOS or Android device with a native-like experience. The only thing you need to convert any website into a mobile application is a reachable website.

Simply input an existing URL into Appdome’s app builder, select your choice of platform (Android, iOS, or cross-platform), and click Convert To App. Within minutes, the Appdome platform automatically converts the website into a mobile application that will run natively on any mobile device for the platform you selected.

Appdome Secure PWA allows developers to control content and provide safe experiences for mobile users.

## 3 Easy Steps To Build Secure PWA With Content Controls

Follow these 3 easy steps to convert a website into an iOS or Android app that supports deep links.

1. From the **Add App** tab, Select **Create Secure PWA™** and enter the **website address** for the website you wish to convert (Note, enter the full address, and ensure that the URL is reachable).![Addpwa](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/AddPWA.png)
2. Choose an **App Name,** then Choose the **App platform**: iOS, Android or both.
   * + For iOS – upload the **Provisioning Profile**

   ![Settings Preview 2](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Settings-Preview-2.png)
3. Click **Convert To App  
   ![Cta Button](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/cta-button.png)**

**[SiteTrust](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/byod-zero-trust/no-code-securepwa/how-appdome-sitetrust-prevents-unauthorized-access-to-your-pwa/)™**  and **CONTENT CONTROL** are automatically enabled when you build a Secure PWA on Appdome.

### **SiteTrust™**

* Protects non-public resources by restricting access/navigation to home domain only.
* When enabled, the app will only be able to access trusted domains and sites.
* To enable access to protected resources, see  the AUTHENTICATION section for advanced authentication services.

### **Content Control**

* **Secure Download**: Securely download, store and share files with other apps.
* **Secure Upload**: Securely upload content to the web service.
* **Local Notifications**: Present alerts and notifications sent by the web service natively.

![Contetnt Control Tab](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/contetnt-control-tab.png)

**Congratulations**! Your PWA has been created! You can find your secure PWA in your Appdome account on the left navigation menu  
![Success! ](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Screen-Shot-2023-12-06-at-13.12.59.png)

### Prerequisites for Using Appdome’s Secure PWA

* [Appdome account](https://fusion.appdome.com/)
* [Appdome-DEV access](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/use-appdome-dev-secure-mobile-apps-at-scalte/)
* A license to Secure PWA
* A reachable website (URL)
* Signing Credentials (e.g., signing certificates and provisioning profile) – see [**Signing Secure Android apps**](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/appsec-release-orchestration/code-signing-protected-android-ios/code-sign-secured-android-apps-in-devsecops-build-system/?__hstc=267077713.6f333f485223b08a173d288e307b095c.1679313524563.1685002563837.1685258775647.167&__hssc=267077713.22.1685258775647&__hsfp=3783124442) and [**Signing Secure iOS apps**](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/appsec-release-orchestration/code-signing-protected-android-ios/appdome-enabling-signing-secured-ios-apps-without-xcode/?__hstc=267077713.6f333f485223b08a173d288e307b095c.1679313524563.1685002563837.1685258775647.167&__hssc=267077713.22.1685258775647&__hsfp=3783124442)

### After Building Your PWA

After successfully converting a website into a secure PWA, there are several available options to complete your project, depending on your app lifecycle or workflow. These include:  

* [Signing Secure iOS and Android apps](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/signing-secured-apps/automated-code-signing-options-secured-android-ios-apps)
* [Customizing, Configuring & Branding Secure Mobile Apps](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/update-app-icon-branding-secured-android-ios-apps/)
* [Deploying/Publishing Secure mobile apps](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/auto-publish-secured-android-ios-apps/) to Public or Private app stores

Or, see this quick reference [Releasing Secured Android & iOS Apps](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/releasing-secured-android-ios-apps/) built on Appdome.
